title: [Bug]: Project cache plugins are not provided the entry targets
body:
### Issue Description

Project cache plugins are not provided the entry targets so are unable to predict the target list for the graph correctly.

eg: `msbuild /t:Build;Test`

Currently implementations of the project cache (eg [MSBuildCache](https://github.com/Microsoft/MSBuildCache) just have to [assume it's just the default targets](https://github.com/microsoft/MSBuildCache/blob/e6851f76d4bbed66e88a51eace208c815dfdb226/src/Common/MSBuildCachePluginBase.cs#L239-L241).

### Steps to Reproduce

See above

### Expected Behavior

See above

### Actual Behavior

See above

### Analysis

_No response_

### Versions & Configurations

_No response_

nodes.body: Note: this is something I'll be looking at
